sentence.Network_en: Subsequent drilling, which resulted in the discovery of oil, supported the telluric - current picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来进行钻探, 结果发现了石油, 证明了大地电流图片是正确的.

sentence.Network_en: Seismic surveys gave a geologic picture quite different from that indicated by the telluric current.
sentence.Network_cn: 地震勘探提供的地质图件与大地电流的结果完全不相同.

sentence.Network_en: The more recently introduced magneto - telluric method has now come into more widespread use.
sentence.Network_cn: 不久前出现的大地电磁法,现在应用得日益广泛.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or containing the chemical element tellurium
2. of or relating to or inhabiting the land as opposed to the sea or air
